DataElement.preferredName: Low Blood Oxygen Saturation Period Less Than Five Minute Prior Organ Excision Occurrence Brief Description Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A description of the epochs of oxygen (O2) desaturation of less than 92% for more than 5 minutes prior to organ excision.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Low Blood Oxygen Saturation Period Less Than Five Minute Prior Organ Excision Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The calculated measurements indicating the degree to which oxygen is bound to hemoglobin is low._An interval of time._A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status._A natural number greater than 4 and less than 6 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of four and one._A unit measure of time equal to 60 seconds._Earlier in time or order._A unique macroscopic (gross) anatomic structure that performs specific functions.  It is composed of various tissues.  An organ is part of an anatomic system or a body region. ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The calculated measurements indicating the degree to which oxygen is bound to hemoglobin is low.:An interval of time.

Concepts.definition: A low level of the degree to which oxygen is bound to hemoglobin given as a percentage calculated by dividing the maximum oxygen capacity into the actual oxygen content and multiplying by 100. Oxygen saturation usually is measured using pulse oximetry.

Property.preferredName: Less Than Five Minute Prior Organ Excision Occurrence
Property.preferredDefinition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.:A natural number greater than 4 and less than 6 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of four and one.:A unit measure of time equal to 60 seconds.:Earlier in time or order.:A unique macroscopic (gross) anatomic structure that performs specific functions.  It is composed of various tissues.  An organ is part of an anatomic system or a body region.  Representative examples include the heart, lung, liver, spleen, and uterus.:The act of cutting out; the surgical removal of part or all of a structure or organ.:An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

Concepts.definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.
A natural number greater than 4 and less than 6 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of four and one.
A unit measure of time equal to 60 seconds.

A unique macroscopic (gross) anatomic structure that performs specific functions. It is composed of various tissues.  An organ is part of an anatomic system or a body region. Representative examples include the heart, lung, liver, spleen, and uterus.
The surgical removal of a lesion, often as part of a biopsy and with healthy margins.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: signs that a person has a condition or disease. Some examples of symptoms are headache, fever, fatigue, nausea, vomiting, and pain(NCI).
